channel.title: 🔥 Open Data hot twitter posts | by onData
channel.description: Tweets about open data, which have received at least 10 hearts or retweets, in many languages

item.title:
The UK has blazed the way to real-time, large-scale pandemic sequencing with an amazing program that's allowed us *so much* insight into #SARSCoV2. Plus, all that data's been shared openly in multiple ways! #opendata #openscience
Huge 👏🏻 to all the people who made this happen! https://t.co/EyymDOq0xH
https://t.co/k5hKcm4EK8 Chiffre expliqué 5 minutes par un type doué de logique sur Paint avec trois données publiques
🟠 Forest Fires🔥 during heatwave near #Marmaris, #Turkey🇹🇷 27 June 2021 #Landsat-8🛰️ Full-size ➡️ https://t.co/WTDDwYdPYM #RemoteSensing #OpenData #scicomm #wildfire https://t.co/pzc08fNn3W

% de Belges ayant reçu au moins une dose:
▓▓▓▓▓▓▓▓▓▓▓▓▓▓▓░░░░░ 75.53%
% de Belges totalement vaccinés:
▓▓▓▓▓▓▓▓░░░░░░░░░░░░ 41.81%
En date du 2021-06-27 Source : open data de Sciensano Pop. de 18 ans et + au 01/01/2021

Un petit nouveau timide* à accueillir dans le monde de l'#opendata !
https://t.co/08ColZQlzH
* 3 premiers jeux de données (après saisine @CadaCommission) https://t.co/NiC70O0Q1n

@elisadelanuez Te entiendo, Elisa, pero sigamos retribuyéndoles cuando depositamos cuentas o por la emisión de informes, pero *no* por la exclusividad en el acceso de una información pública que es de interés general. Actualicemos el modelo arancelario a la era de internet y los datos abiertos.
En fait j’ai l’impression qu’on a toutes les briques pour faire un bel open data, il suffit de les assembler. Référencer les données, fournir une documentation sur leur contenu etc.
Cette page de @datagouvfr récapitule tous les #OpenData sur les élections. Rien ne concerne les régionales ou départementales de 2021, et... https://t.co/hKTEhqe8YE

On est en 2021, et on n’a pas d'#OpenData sur les élections (régionales, en l’occurence). Des citoyens ou journalistes doivent scraper le site du ministère pour agréger les données. https://t.co/m7CfqQo1Pc

#EUSpace for #EUGreenDeal
One of the worst consequences of #ClimateChange is #drought 🚰
EUSpace🇪🇺🛰️ #OpenData delivers unique datasets that allow to prevent, monitor and mitigate effects on economic sectors such as #agriculture 👩‍🌾🚜, #energy 🌬️🍃etc https://t.co/XPw4OT32LE

Entdecke spannende Datenvisualisierungen, die von den Studierenden der @unibern 2021 entwickelt wurden.
Die #OpenData stammen unter anderem vom @BFEgeoinfo, @CHblw, ASTRA, @OpenDataBS, @ogd_tg, @SBB_Innovation von @BERNMOBIL und von @vbz_zueri_linie https://t.co/20GIQnNq1Y https://t.co/aPxNYnbaEH

📲acceder,
📩descargar,
🖇copiar y
📖utilizar toda su información de forma gratuita . . . ↘https://t.co/xGMYCRlVGE↙ https://t.co/wdKReIDTFU

Do you need access to a Fluorescence Microscope, Scanning FTIR, or other #Microplastics Research lab equipment? After I graduate I will start working @MoorePlasticRes and we got what you need and want to collaborate. Hit me up.

Honest question: How can someone "own" a spectral fingerprint? It is like saying, "I own the color orange". I am not sure how proprietary spectral libraries have been getting away with this without someone coming in and copying all their spectra. #OpenData

Aliás, em uma democracia digital a lista de pessoas com acesso, níveis de acesso e justificativa deveria ser inteiramente aberta, pública e legível por máquinas. #dadosabertos pra processos democráticos também
Every Building in France ~ 42 GB ~ 🤓🇫🇷🌍🏘️ #gischat #BigData #France #OpenData https://t.co/211DUqVOvj

Multidimensional poverty is measured by income in addition to deprivation in dimensions like: ✏️Education 🚑Healthcare 💧Sanitation
How can countries start measuring multidimensional poverty? We worked with @UNDP @UNICEF to create new guidance: https://t.co/YwqMA0gJ1c https://t.co/k6II2KH5pX

L'Italia, come gran parte dei Paesi europei, non ha confermato la pubblicazione in formato #opendata dei dati sul #Recovery e non ha varato alcun progetto per facilitare il monitoraggio dal basso dei fondi. E' urgente rimediare. #pnrr
https://t.co/9BBDGgcfkA

@borghi_claudio @chedisagio E i morti in UK, perché non risalgono? Come hanno fatto a calare da 1800 morti al giorno a qualche decina a marzo? Perché ora non risalgono le ospedalizzazioni? Perché i contagi sono concentrati fortissimo nelle categorie non ancora vaccinate? https://t.co/rzJEs0h9ws

[อ่านใหม่] เก็บความจากงาน 'Open Data for Anti-Corruption Workshop' จัดโดยสถาบันเพื่อการยุติธรรมแห่งประเทศไทย (TIJ) ร่วมด้วย 5 องค์กรพันธมิตร ว่าด้วยการใช้ Open Data ในการต่อต้านคอร์รัปชัน ถอดบทเรียนจากฟิลิปปินส์ ไต้หวัน และอัพเดตความคืบหน้าในไทย TIJ x 101 https://t.co/czGIf7dLQd

El Estado de #Veracruz cuenta con el 24% de población vacunada con 1 dosis de vacuna vs #Covid_19
#Xalapa a la fecha sin datos abiertos pero con el conteo de lotes tendría 22% de población con 1 dosis y 11% con esquema completo. La próxima semana podemos mejorar los números.

Aunque te canses de hablar de #COVID19mx el virus SARS-Cov-2 no se cansa de infectar y mutar. #UsaCubrebocas bien ajustado a nariz y boca sin válvula, vacúnate lo más pronto que puedas y, si no es estrictamente necesario salir, mejor #QuedateEnCasa Datos: https://t.co/KtMF6zGWmj

How would this (https://t.co/uGhvWtrKZZ) work in web3 world:
- Ppl install a sensor on their water faucet to earn the daily reward, use-water-as-mining - Sensor collects data to IoTeX network - Open data being used meritocratically produces value, which backs the daily reward

780 thousand metric tonnes of petroleum products were released into the environment during the BP oil spill. BP paid BILLIONS for the cleanup and research.
10 million metric tonnes of #PlasticPollution are released to the environment yearly. Where's my money plastic industry?

En MX, como en todo el mundo, están muriendo de COVID personas vacunadas.
El problema es que en MX hay fundadas sospechas de vacunas de mala calidad, mal manejadas, jeringas vacías, mal aplicadas, dosis diluidas , con mayor tiempo de espera entre dosis... y sin datos abiertos.

@BBCAmos @Esri @ImpactObserv @Microsoft_Green @defis_eu @ESA_EO And the power of open data. Vital to note (& of course I know you know 🙂) that @CopernicusEU is a civil govt programme funded by EU taxpayers, & that the data are freely accessible to public, govt, non-profit, commercial, etc. users worldwide. That’s hugely significant.

@newschambers Great data. Am sure @paulreiddublin, @DonnellyStephen & @muirtheimhne all agree it’s key public info which should be published in an open data format, rather than by tweet. Brilliant work to get the detail online internally post-hack, hopefully soon to be visible to public also.

That’s a lot of great data news there.
Be great if it was published regularly through an open data process again soon. https://t.co/nnpNJVoXpc https://t.co/qUSM14yE27

I don't get this branding of "open data" as something different from "open banking." What is open banking if not open data?
Feels like one of those consulting firm "thought leader" attempts to be the first to name some trend.
